column5: This is a perfect home away from home. It has everything any five star luxury hotel suit has to offer and much more with a personal and home like feel. The balcony offers a gorgeous view of the woodlands . Location is one of the most attractive parts. Minutes away walk from art district. There is a walking trail . We often walk to the cinema  Minutes drive to Ross, Home Depot, z gallery, Best Buy, HEB, Target etc  You have to live it to believe it!!  I hope you enjoy your stay with us!
column8: The woodlands 5 star retreat- No cleaning fees
